definition: the very moment/just then/during (that brief interval)
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 夾當|夹当[jia1 dang1]

sentences.english: It was in the course of his reading that Magnus caught the sound of his name.
sentences.chinese: 曼克奈斯就在他念的当儿，听见了自己的名字。

sentences.english: Let's sing a song during the break.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁这空当儿唱支歌。

sentences.english: Please be quiet while I figure out the correct amount.
sentences.chinese: 我在计算出正确数额的当儿，请安静一点。

sentences.english: He recuperated back in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 他康复的当儿，回到纽约市。

sentences.english: As it crossed the meadow , I could see it was a black timber wolf.
sentences.chinese: 在它穿过草地的当儿，我可以看到它是一只黑狼。

sentences.english: Jimmy went to explore while Tommy unpacked the food.
sentences.chinese: 准备食物的当儿，吉米去探险。

sentences.english: But in the meantime I thought perhaps you could choose one or two volumes for a down payment.
sentences.chinese: 在这当儿我想你不妨挑一两本书作为我的首付款。

sentences.english: Syme had folded up his strip of paper and stowed it away in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 这当儿，赛姆叠起他那张纸条，放到口袋里。

sentences.english: The waiter asked her if she would have something while it was being cooked.
sentences.chinese: 侍者问她在鲑鱼烹制的当儿，要不要吃点别的。

sentences.english: They prefer it out in the meadow , where they can get a graze on .
sentences.chinese: 在它穿过草地的当儿，我可以看到它是一只黑狼。

sentences.english: You can put on your coat while I'm starting.
sentences.chinese: 我去把车开出来，趁这当儿，你把大衣穿好。

sentences.english: In stead of waiting the death comes, I am still doing something.
sentences.chinese: 在等待死的当儿，我做了一些事情。

sentences.english: Jimmy went to explore while Tommy unpacked the food.
sentences.chinese: 在汤米准备食物的当儿，吉米去探险。

sentences.english: Wondering what will be the best gift for my lovely little angle's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 思考着要给小天使什么最好的礼物当儿。

sentences.english: One funny thing though, my eyes actually watered while I was taking the photographs.
sentences.chinese: 说起来也奇怪，在拍照的当儿，我的眼眶是湿湿的。

definition: to be just about to/to be on the point of
(idiom) no sooner said than done/before you know it
pinyin: shuo1 shi2 chi2 , na4 shi2 kuai4

definition: just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
